name: simple seamless double crochet hat
sizes_available: preemie, newborn, 0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 12-24 months, small child (3-5 years), child (6-10 years), teen (adult small), adult medium + adult large
notes:
this hat is designed to reach mid-ear. additional instructions have been included for each hat size to make the hat reach the base-of-the-earlobe and slouch hat lengths.

finished project: newborn hat: 0.74 oz (21 g) and 35.7 yds (32.7 m) and adult medium hat: 2.04 oz (58 g) and 98.6 yds (90.5 m) 

the simple seamless double crochet hat pattern is made from the top-down in one-piece. the hat is crocheted without slip stitches or chain stitches to give you a seamless finished hat.

> this pattern is available for free on
> my blog which is monetized by ads. if
> you prefer an ad-free version of the
> pattern, it is available to purchase
> right here on ravelry.
